txt.en: 'Ready? Excellent. These layabouts guarding me need some exercise anyway.\n\n'Keep a sharp eye, you might pick up some decorating tips. My house is one of the best furnished in all of Umbar.'

'Only a fool trusts those he doesn't know. But we're good friends now, aren't we? I will trust you, for now. 

'You must come with me to my house here in Umbar. Well, one of them, anyway. I also make residence in Thargushakâl, the Shoreward Stone, but this house has many advantages. Namely, a much shorter walk.'

Khôltekh roars in laughter, amused at his own joke.

'Make ready, we will be off soon.'
Khôltekh has taken you into his trust, for now. He's asked you to accompany him to his house to speak more about his plans for Umbar.
